name: 1.11 "One for the Books" Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 1 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What was the name of the couple waiting for a table at Melville's?
questions.explanation:
Philips.

	The Philipses asked Coach to go see if their table is ready. To go to Melville's you have to have on a dress jacket so he took off his apron, put on the jacket, went up and in a few seconds came back down because he forgot the name.

WWI.

	Buzz was played by Ian Wolfe. Wolfe was born November 4, 1896 and died at age 95 in 1992.  WWI was fought 1914-1918.

questions.text: What was Coach's reply to the war Buzz was in?
questions.correct: "Is that the one with Clark Gable?"
options: "Is that the one that ended on November 11th?"
"Is that the one right after the American Civil War?"
questions.explanation:
"Is that the one with Clark Gable?".

	Coach thought that the Buzz was talking about a movie not an actual war. Coach was never the brightest of the people on "Cheers" but his innocence made him even more charming.

questions.text: How much did the juke box cost?
questions.explanation:
10 cents.

	The piano cost 25 cents. Neither items worked and when someone tried to play the piano Carla said, "Play the juke box, it doesn't work either but it only cost ten cents."

questions.text: What did Kevin plan to become?
questions.explanation:
a monk.

	Kevin was played by Boyd Bodwell.  Kevin decided to live in the world and try everything a regular guy would do before he became a monk.

questions.text: How long did it take Kevin to drink one drink?
questions.explanation:
4 hours.

	Kevin asked Sam if four hours was what they called nursing a drink. Carla replied, "That's what they call bringing it back from the dead."

Diane.

	Kevin wanted to experience everything so he decided to hit on a woman at the bar. That woman was Diane, who was totally caught off guard.

questions.text: Who told Kevin that sex was not important?
questions.explanation:
Carla.

	At one point Carla said, "Can sex make a baby? Forget that one." She didn't want to see Kevin give up his calling because of one night in a bar.

Coach.

	The others thought that Kevin had some special power because when he went to use the broken piano it worked. This convinced Kevin to go in to the monastery after all. After he left, Coach said he got the piano fixed.

questions.text: How many people for Buzz's troupe reunion showed up besides Buzz?
questions.explanation:
0.

	Buzz was quite old and said that every year there were less and less of his troupe left. He said he was the only one left now. The Cheers' gang want to make him feel better so they offered to have a reunion with him every ten years. They kept shortening the time and Buzz was happy until they sang, then he said, "Every ten years will be fine."
